Title: Avatar of Mueh'zala
Description:
It be down to dis moment: working with our loa to save de soul of de Darkspear.

See if Jani has found anything. Hopefully, his item will let you get close enough to Tzadah's effigies to destroy dem. That should give us a chance to strike the Witch Doctor herself. I'll occupy her attention with Kevo ya Siti's aid, but watch out for her guardians. Dey won't let you destroy her effigies without a fight.
ObjectivesText: Collect Jani's blessing and then travel with Lukou to the top of the pillars to defeat Tzadah's protection totems.
PortraitGiverText: Mueh'zala has granted Tzadah immunity and extreme power.
